00557 UINT32 k_GetPixelFast(int x, int y,const TImage* pInfo);
00558 
00565 #define k_GetPixel1bp(x,y,Image) ((((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][(x)>>3])&(0x80>>((x)&0x7)))!=0)
00566 
00573 #define k_GetPixel8bp(x,y,Image) (((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][(x)])&0xff)
00574 
00581 #ifdef IPL_BIG_ENDIAN
00582 #define k_GetPixel24bp(x,y,Image) ((((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)+2]) << 16) | (((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)+1]) << 8) | ((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)]))
00583 #else
00584 #define k_GetPixel24bp(x,y,Image) ((*(UINT32*)(&((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)])))&0xffffff)
00585 #endif /* IPL_BIG_ENDIAN */
00586 
00594 bool k_SetPixel(int x, int y, UINT32 Color,TImage* pInfo);
00595 
00603 bool k_SetPixelFast(int x, int y, UINT32 Color,TImage* pInfo);
00604 
00611 #define k_SetPixel1bp(x,y,Color,Image) (Color ? ((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][(x)>>3] |= (0x80>>((x) & 0x7))) : ((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][(x)>>3] &= (0xff7f>>((x) & 0x7))))
00612 
00613 
00620 #define k_SetPixel8bp(x,y,Color,Image) ((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][(x)]=(UINT8)Color);
00621 
00628 #ifdef IPL_BIG_ENDIAN
00629 #define k_SetPixel24bp(x,y,Color,Image) {(Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)]=(UINT8)Color;(Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)+1]=(UINT8)(Color>>8);(Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)+2]=(UINT8)(Color>>16);}
00630 #else
00631 #define k_SetPixel24bp(x,y,Color,Image) (*((UINT32*)&((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)])) = ((*((UINT32*)&((Image).ppMatrix[(y)][3*(x)]))) & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff));
00632 #endif /* IPL_BIG_ENDIAN */
